Property Information
Special Offer 1
Move In Specials!
CALL FOR THIS WEEKS PRICING SPECIALS!! Disclaimer The owner of or advertiser for this listing arranged for its posting on Move.com and is solely responsible for all offers, claims and other listing content.
CALL FOR THIS WEEKS PRICING SPECIALS!!COME HOME to garden style apartment homes in the heart of the beautiful city of ORANGE!!! Upgraded with brushed nickel fixtures, custom paint with accent walls, and more nestled in magnificently designed landscape with lots of trees that brings the tranquil park feeling home. Our community offers 2 SPARKLING POOLS, SPA, 24-HOUR smart card LAUNDRY CENTERS, Community BBQs with trellis, and fitness center. We are only MINUTES from the METROLINK station, major freeways, UCI Medical Center, St. Joseph Hospital, CHOC, MAIN PLACE MALL,Orange Circle, Block of Orange, Chapman University, Angel Stadium and Disneyland Resort. The added convenience of next door grocery shopping at the newly remodeled Ralphs Supermarket is all yours. Friendly on-site management that assures prompt attention to your needs. STRADA Apartment Homes, where your convenience is our business.*Subect to availability/O.A.C.
130 Units Call for Availability: (888)403-1137
